Name: Software Architect
Description: Creates and manages software blueprint components for the tenant.

AssignedPermissions.name: Access Blueprint and Blueprint Component Design GUI
AssignedPermissions.description: Access the blueprint and blueprint component design GUI.

AssignedPermissions.name: Catalog Tenant-level Author
AssignedPermissions.description: Create, update and publish services, catalog items and actions shared across a Tenant.

AssignedPermissions.name: Consume content tenant wide
AssignedPermissions.description: Consume and export content in the tenant context.

AssignedPermissions.name: Author Software Blueprint Components
AssignedPermissions.description: Create, edit and publish software blueprint components for the tenant.

AssignedPermissions.name: Consume Composite Blueprints
AssignedPermissions.description: View composite blueprints belonging to the tenant.

AssignedPermissions.name: Consume Software Blueprint Components
AssignedPermissions.description: View software blueprint components belonging to the tenant.

AssignedPermissions.name: Publish Blueprint Components
AssignedPermissions.description: Publish blueprint components for reuse in the tenant.

AssignedPermissions.name: Consume Published Blueprint Components
AssignedPermissions.description: View and reuse published blueprint components belonging to the tenant.

AssignedPermissions.name: Author Composite Blueprints
AssignedPermissions.description: Assemble, edit and publish composite blueprints for the tenant.

AssignedPermissions.name: Author content tenant wide
AssignedPermissions.description: Create, edit ,import and publish content in the tenant context.
